text: And in a marriage you can't TRY and be married. You're married or you're not married... as far as I'm concerned.
author: Ringo Starr

text: Success is hard in general for most women. We now have such busy lives, and we're told we can do everything - you know, we can have the relationship and the marriage and the kids and the career.
author: Cat Deeley

text: There were times after my marriage ended where, you know, I really felt like I was at the bottom of a mountain, there was a great big, fog up there, and I'm never going to cross to the other side.
author: Lynn Redgrave

text: I don't want marriage. You know why? Because I did that. I did it for 32 years.
author: Lynn Redgrave

text: Marriage is the mother of the world. It preserves kingdoms, and fills cities and churches, and heaven itself.
author: Jeremy Taylor
